answers.answer: The large scale medical studies performed to date, have shown that tight and consistent control of blood sugar, will reduce the risk or possibly progression of diabetic neuropathy. Unfortunately there is no specific treatment apart from analgesia.It is also very important to control blood pressure, in terms  of the risk of stroke.As far as the other symptoms go, I don't have enough information here to provide a comment. Check with your GP and for an referral to a neurologist.Good luck
